amendment.description: To provide emergency disaster assistance to agricultural producers in Florida and other States due to losses from hurricanes, droughts, freezes, floods, and other natural disasters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3636 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3636 proposed by Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S9184-9187, S9200, S9201; text: CR S9184-9185) To provide emergency disaster assistance to agricultural producers in Florida and other States due to losses from hurricanes, droughts, freezes, floods, and other natural disasters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3636 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3636 proposed by Senator Baucus.
